title: Patch Notes
content: if anyone in the party was being dominated by an enemy, causing a Game Over. Fixed the skiff at the Morphic Pool sometimes appearing in the wrong spot or floating in the air. Fixed body type 1 duergar incorrectly receiving halfling stats instead of dwarf stats. Fixed Gimblebock getting stuck if his attack triggered a Reaction. Fixed characters not being able to pick up any items if an invalid pickup request was, somehow, stored in the savegame. Fixed a bug causing non-Dark-Urge avatars to say Da
